name: Save A Small World (LD38)
description:
This is a match 3 game about saving the world from pollution that we made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38. The concept is that you are saving the world from pollution by helping to recycle garbage around the world.

Art and code was all our own work (only the maps of the world were sourced from NASA's Blue Marble images, but we edited them a bit to pixelate them). Sound and music were sourced off freesound.org and freemusicarchive.org.

Move tiles by dragging them with the mouse. You can quit with the ESC key.
